EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Academy Launches All-new Spring Curriculum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Are you interested in exploring the world of microservices? Do you want to learn how the Spring Framework helps developers build modern microservices architectures and deliver business value quickly?
Pivotal Academy is introducing several all-new training courses focused on the latest Spring technologies: Spring Boot and Spring Cloud Services. These instructor-led courses provide experienced Java developers with the skills needed to unleash the full capabilities of Spring. With hands-on, lab-based, curriculum taught by expert instructors, your team will learn how to develop and deploy applications, faster and easier:
- Spring Boot Developer <[[https://pivotal.io/academy/course/spring-boot-developer]]> is a two-day course designed for application developers who are responsible for creating enterprise-ready applications using Spring Boot. The course explores auto-configuration, data access, Actuator and more - Spring Cloud Services <[[https://pivotal.io/academy/course/spring-cloud-services]]> is a two-day course that teaches participants how to develop Spring cloud-native applications. The course leverages Spring Boot and Spring Cloud to solve challenges associated with running a distributed, microservices-based architecture and explores the value that a Platform-as-a-Service adds in the microservices-based world
Instructor-led Spring Cloud Services and Spring Boot Developer classes are available today. Learn more about our Spring portfolio and register for a class by visiting https://pivotal.io/academy <[[https://pivotal.io/academy]]>.
